SEARCH
Package proxy.commands

Class DownloadFromURL

java.lang.Object
proxy.commands.DownloadFromURL
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command, Errors
public class DownloadFromURL extends Object implements Command, Errors
DownloadFromURL is a class that implements the Command interface, allowing users to download content from a specified URL with various filtering options.

    flagFactory
    An instance of the "FlagFactory" class, used to create instances of denying flags based on the given option.
    (package private) String
    flags
    The name of the file where the downloaded contents will be saved and the denying options that will be applied to the download, represented as a string of characters.

    • COOKIE_FIELD

      public static final String COOKIE_FIELD
      Constants representing the HTTP header fields "Content-Type" and "Set-Cookie".
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • BLOCK_IMAGES

      public static final char BLOCK_IMAGES
      Constants representing the denying options that can be applied to the download. "BLOCK_IMAGES" represents the option to block images, "BLOCK_COOKIES" represents the option to block HTTP responses containing cookies, "BLOCK_HTML" represents the option to block HTML documents and "BLOCK_FROM_LIST" represents the option to deny access to blocked sites from the list in the file.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • BLOCK_COOKIES

      public static final char BLOCK_COOKIES
      Constants representing the denying options that can be applied to the download. "BLOCK_IMAGES" represents the option to block images, "BLOCK_COOKIES" represents the option to block HTTP responses containing cookies, "BLOCK_HTML" represents the option to block HTML documents and "BLOCK_FROM_LIST" represents the option to deny access to blocked sites from the list in the file.
      See Also:

"BLOCK_IMAGES" represents the option to block images, "BLOCK_COOKIES" represents the option to block HTTP responses containing cookies, "BLOCK_HTML" represents the option to block HTML documents and "BLOCK_FROM_LIST" represents the option to deny access to blocked sites from the list in the file.

"BLOCK_IMAGES" represents the option to block images, "BLOCK_COOKIES" represents the option to block HTTP responses containing cookies, "BLOCK_HTML" represents the option to block HTML documents and "BLOCK_FROM_LIST" represents the option to deny access to blocked sites from the list in the file.

  • Constructor Details

    • DownloadFromURL

      public DownloadFromURL(String url, String flags, String out) throws IOException
      Constructs a DownloadFromURL object with the provided URL, flags, and output file path.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to download the content from.
      flags - A string containing flags that determine the filtering options.
      out - The path to the output file where the downloaded content will be saved.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while initializing the connection.

  • Method Details

    • registerFlag

      public void registerFlag(char flag)
      Registers a flag to the flagFactory based on the flag character provided.
      Parameters:
      flag - The flag character representing the filtering option.

    • getConnection

      public HttpURLConnection getConnection() throws IOException
      Initializes an HttpURLConnection object and connects to the specified URL.
      Returns:
      The HttpURLConnection object connected to the specified URL.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while opening the connection.

    • download

      private void download() throws IOException
      Downloads the content from the specified URL and saves it to the output file path.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while downloading or saving the content.

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Executes the command, downloading the content from the specified URL and applying the filtering options based on the provided flags.
      Specified by:
